title: Fantastic 4 bed, 1.5 bath steps to Brighton Center, Starbucks
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302373795', 'Rent: $3,400 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Centrally located in the heart of Brighton this 4 bed / 1.5 bath is Pet Friendly and positioned between Brighton Center and Oak Square.', 'This property is on a quiet, set back lot with two off street parking spots included.', 'Just one block from express bus, YMCA, Starbucks, restaurants and more.', 'Hardwood floors and a spacious in kitchen are just a couple of the features that make this unit so desirable.', '4 large bedrooms spread out over 2 levels with 2 bathrooms.', "You don't want to miss out on this spot at this reasonable price.", 'FEATURES', 'Fireplace (Decorative)', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Yard', 'Broker Fees May apply', 'CALL/TEXT  MATT 781-316-4295', 'Rock Hill Residential Group', '300 Market Street', 'Brighton, MA 02135', 'c: 781.316.4295', 'website: <URL>', 'Listing Agent / Landlord make no representation or warranty as to the accuracy or completeness of the information provided herein.', 'Any prospective tenant will rely on their own independent evaluation pertaining to the information provided.', 'Prospective tenants should make their own projections, assumptions and conclusions regarding the subject properties.']
